chess

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Piece class: the bread and butter of this entire project. A piece is the general term for something like a pawn, knight ... etc

      Piece constructor

      boolean validMove(Piece p)
      General valid move detection, if a piece is trying to move into an empty spot or not attacking its own team, its a valid move

    • Method Detail

      • validMove

        public boolean validMove(Piece p)
        General valid move detection, if a piece is trying to move into an empty spot or not attacking its own team, its a valid move
        Parameters:
        p - The piece in question
        Returns:
        boolean - whether or not the move was valid

      • getTeam

        public char getTeam()
        Returns:
        Return the color of the team of the piece using this method [w,b]

      • getType

        public char getType()
        Returns:
        Return the piece type of the piece calling this method[p,r,b,n,q,k]

      • getOppositeTeam

        public char getOppositeTeam()
        Returns:
        Return the color of the opposite team of the piece using this method

      • isOppositeTeam

        public boolean isOppositeTeam(Piece p)
        Parameters:
        p - The piece being compared to the piece using this method
        Returns:
        true/false - whether or not the piece calling this method on another piece is of the opposite team

      • sameTeam

        public boolean sameTeam(Piece p)
        Parameters:
        p - The piece being compared to the piece using this method
        Returns:
        true/false - whether or not the piece calling this method on another piece is of the same team

      • validMove

        public int validMove(int row1,
                     int column1,
                     int row2,
                     int column2,
                     Piece[][] board,
                     int turn)
        Parameters:
        row1 - the row of the piece that is to be moved
        column1 - the column of the piece that is to be moved
        row2 - the row of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        column2 - the column of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        board - the current state of the game board
        turn - the current turn
        Returns:
        return 1 if valid, however, this should never be reached

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String - piece to string

      • underAttack

        public Piece underAttack(int row,
                         int column,
                         Piece[][] Board,
                         int turn)
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the piece that is to be checked
        column - the column of the piece that is to be checked
        Board - the current state of the game board
        turn - the current turn
        Returns:
        used for testing / checkmate - will return pieces that are under threat of another piece

      • underAttack

        public static Piece underAttack(int row,
                                int column,
                                char teamUnderAttack,
                                Piece[][] Board,
                                int turn)
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the piece that is to be checked
        column - the column of the piece that is to be checked
        teamUnderAttack - The char representing which team the piece is
        Board - the current state of the game board
        turn - the current turn
        Returns:
        used for testing / checkmate - will return pieces that are under threat of another piece

      • clearPath

        public Piece clearPath(int row1,
                       int column1,
                       int row2,
                       int column2,
                       Piece[][] Board)
        Parameters:
        row1 - the row of the piece that is to be moved
        column1 - the column of the piece that is to be moved
        row2 - the row of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        column2 - the column of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        Board - the current state of the game board
        Returns:
        Returns null if nothing is blocking the path, a Piece object if something is

      • safePath

        public Piece safePath(int row1,
                      int column1,
                      int row2,
                      int column2,
                      Piece[][] Board,
                      int turn)
        Parameters:
        row1 - the row of the piece that is to be moved
        column1 - the column of the piece that is to be moved
        row2 - the row of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        column2 - the column of which the piece moving wishes to move to
        Board - the current state of the game board
        turn - the current turn
        Returns:
        Returns null if nothing is blocking the path, a Piece object if something is - used for castling
